desc: Animalia is an all natural pet supply store. We specialize in the health of pets by examining the reasons for their illnesses then rearrange their eating habits and introduce wellness products that balance their entire systems so that they heal naturally.

layout.text: Nourishing your pet while providing flavors and treats they love shouldn’t be difficult. At Animalia NoHo, we put the best of the best at your fingertips. Shop with us, and you’ll not only improve your pet’s quality of life, you’ll make the environment a better place. Explore our selection and treat your fur baby today!
